content.name: license
content.description: Information about licenses on the storage system.  @engdocs  Supercedes the previous implementation of licenses via C4CB_LicensedFeature  and LicensingServices.

attributes.name: isValid
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the license is currently valid. Values are:
  • true - License is valid. It is either permanent, or the expiration date has not yet passed.
  • false - License is invalid.

attributes.name: expires
attributes.description: Date and time when the license will expire.

attributes.name: issued
attributes.description: Date and time when the license became available.

attributes.name: feature
attributes.description: Name of the feature that the license enables.

attributes.name: isInstalled
attributes.description: Indicates whether the license is installed or not.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the license instance.

attributes.name: isPermanent
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the license is permanent. Values are:
  • true - License is permanent.
  • false - License is temporary.
